title: Livet etter
overview: Paradise Hotel is one of Norway's largest reality programs. Participants become celebrities overnight and face tremendous pressure from both media and fans. But what really happens behind the scenes? And how is it to suddenly become a person everyone should have an opinion about? In "livet etter" we follow some of this year's participants for 100 days after their return from Mexico. Uncensored, unfiltered, and totally real - Life after Paradise Hotel.
